cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.CL. 

The paper deals with the problem of curve text detection, which is a subfield of computer vision (cs.CV). The proposed method uses a CNN to extract local features, which is a common technique in artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also mentions the use of contextual information, which is a common topic in information retrieval (cs.IR) and natural language processing (cs.CL). Therefore, these five sub-categories are the most likely ones for this paper.
